data.eml:eml: A new species of Gegeneophis Peters (Amphibia: Gymnophiona: Caeciliidae) from Goa, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bhatta, Gopalakrishna (2007): A new species of Gegeneophis Peters (Amphibia: Gymnophiona: Caeciliidae) from Goa, India. Zootaxa 1409: 51-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175555
